title: WAMC News Podcast - Episode 342
dc:creator: WAMC Northeast Public Radio
description: How crime in Albany factors into New York’s gubernatorial race. We hear from Long Island Republican Congressman Lee Zeldin, who campaigned in Albany last week, and the Democratic city mayor, Kathy Sheehan, who says Zeldin missed the mark.
